mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction(tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_data, dlvy_date) VALUES(seq_transaction_tran_no.nextval, #{purchaseProd.prodNo}, #{buyer.userId}, #{paymentOption:VARCHAR}, #{receiverName:VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone:VARCHAR}, #{dlvyAddr:VARCHAR}, #{dlvyRequest:VARCHAR}, 2, SYSDATE, #{dlvyDate:DATE})
mapper.select: SELECT tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_data, dlvy_date FROM transaction WHERE tran_no = #{value}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM (SELECT prod_no, buyer_id, receiver_name, receiver_phone, tran_status_code FROM TRANSACTION ORDER BY order_data) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM < = #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT prod_no, buyer_id, receiver_name, receiver_phone, tran_no, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request, dlvy_date, tran_status_code, order_data FROM transaction) countTable
